name: Jump Evacuation
description:
Warning: Contains mild flash effect

Jump Evacuation You destroyed the very heart of an evil planet but now you need to evacuate your crew and yourself from this collapsing debris. Gear up and calculate your jumps for your survival.


Play in three different game mods: Story Mode: Jump through 45 seconds lasting layers. Finish the story mode to unravel the secrets of the operation. Endless Mode: You want more and you want it fast? Here is the endless mode. Stack combo to get the highest score. Don't forget to send your high score in the comments. 1v1 Mode: Challenge your friends to get higher score. Play local multiplayer in split screen.


  Made by Ahmet Firat Gamsiz for (formerly) Kenney Jam in two days
    Soundtrack
  • Night Owl by Broke For Free
  • Escape Velocity by Metalogue
  • Horizon Ending by Soft and Furious
  • Good Day To Die by Möbius
  • Starling by Podington Bear
